committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Administrative State, Regulatory Reform, and Antitrust

official_title: To amend chapter 8 of title 5, United States Code, to provide for en bloc consideration in resolutions of disapproval for "midnight rules", and for other purposes.
subjects: Presidents and presidential powers, Vice Presidents

summary.text:
Midnight Rules Relief Act of 2021

This bill allows Congress to disapprove multiple regulations under one joint resolution of disapproval if the regulations were submitted for review during the last 60 legislative days of the final year of a President's term. Currently, each joint resolution may disapprove of only one regulation.

titles.title: To amend chapter 8 of title 5, United States Code, to provide for en bloc consideration in resolutions of disapproval for "midnight rules", and for other purposes.
